subject: AI & Agents
title: AI Will Solve Everything: The Techno-Optimism Trap
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on AI Will Solve Everything: The Techno-Optimism Trap.

hook.text: Climate change? AI will fix it. Disease? AI will cure it. Poverty? AI will end it. Right?

buildup.text: Techno-optimism assumes every hard problem just needs better technology. AI is the latest savior candidate.

discovery.text: Most global challenges are political, social, and economic â€” not technical. AI doesn't solve governance.

twist.text: Believing AI will solve everything lets leaders avoid the hard work of systemic change.

climax.text: AI is a powerful tool. But tools don't solve problems. People using tools deliberately do.

punchline.text: The hammer doesn't build the house. The builder does.

quiz.question: Why is the belief that AI will solve everything potentially harmful?
options: It lets leaders avoid the hard work of systemic political and social change
AI actually can solve every problem
Optimism is always bad for technology
